short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT with customizable conversation styles - normal, concise, and in-depth responses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT Style Selector enhances your ChatGPT conversations with three powerful modes:

Key Features:

- Style Switching: Easily switch between Normal, Concise, and In-depth response modes
- Normal Mode: Standard ChatGPT responses for general conversations
- Concise Mode: Get straight-to-the-point, brief answers
- In-depth Mode: Receive comprehensive explanations with detailed analysis

Advanced Features:
- Style persistence between sessions
- Optional style sync across tabs
- Text direction support (LTR, RTL, Auto-detect)
- Customizable NumPad Enter behavior
- Clean, intuitive interface with visual style indicators

Perfect for:
- Students needing different levels of explanation
- Professionals requiring varying response depths
- Anyone wanting more control over ChatGPT response style

Privacy-Focused:
- No data collection
- Works entirely locally
- No external dependencies
- Your conversations stay private

Simple to use: Just click the pencil icon in ChatGPT interface to switch styles!
